Column.Name: Achieved Value
Column.ValidationFormula: IF( ISBLANK($thisValue), "You must provide the achieved value for the performance period", NULL )

Column.Name: Date of Result
Column.ValidationFormula: IF( ISBLANK($thisValue), "You must provide the date the result was achieved", NULL )

Column.Name: Vendor Access Enabled
Column.Formula: IFERROR( DB_LOOKUP( "Vendor Access Enabled", "Contract", "[RecordID] = " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([Contract RecordID]) ), NULL() )

Column.Name: Enabled Vendor Actions
Column.Formula: IFERROR( DB_LOOKUP( "Enabled Vendor Actions", "Contract", "[RecordID] = " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([Contract RecordID]) ), NULL() )

Column.Name: Parent Structure
Notes Processor

Binding.Expression:
"
"

Label.Text: The final result of this KPI performance
The target value for this performance period
The achieved value for this performance period
The effective date the performance value was achieved
Submitting this result will notify the Contract Manager that the performance details have been provided. Once submitted, performance details may not be updated.

Binding.Expression: "KPI performance submitted " & [Date Submitted] & " by " & [Submitted by Displayname]

RichLabel.Text:
<title></title>
<style type="text/css">/* CSS talk bubble */
.talk-bubble {
	margin: 40px;
  display: inline-block;
  position: relative;
	width: 200px;
	height: auto;
	background-color: lightyellow;
}
.border{
  border: 8px solid #666;
}
.round{
  border-radius: 30px;
	-webkit-border-radius: 30px;
	-moz-border-radius: 30px;

}

/* Right triangle placed top left flush. */
.tri-right.border.left-top:before {
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
  left: -40px;
	right: auto;
  top: -8px;
	bottom: auto;
	border: 32px solid;
	border-color: #666 transparent transparent transparent;
}
.tri-right.left-top:after{
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
  left: -20px;
	right: auto;
  top: 0px;
	bottom: auto;
	border: 22px solid;
	border-color: lightyellow transparent transparent transparent;
}

/* Right triangle, left side slightly down */
.tri-right.border.left-in:before {
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
  left: -40px;
	right: auto;
  top: 30px;
	bottom: auto;
	border: 20px solid;
	border-color: #666 #666 transparent transparent;
}
.tri-right.left-in:after{
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
  left: -20px;
	right: auto;
  top: 38px;
	bottom: auto;
	border: 12px solid;
	border-color: lightyellow lightyellow transparent transparent;
}

/*Right triangle, placed bottom left side slightly in*/
.tri-right.border.btm-left:before {
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
	left: -8px;
  right: auto;
  top: auto;
	bottom: -40px;
	border: 32px solid;
	border-color: transparent transparent transparent #666;
}
.tri-right.btm-left:after{
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
	left: 0px;
  right: auto;
  top: auto;
	bottom: -20px;
	border: 22px solid;
	border-color: transparent transparent transparent lightyellow;
}

/*Right triangle, placed bottom left side slightly in*/
.tri-right.border.btm-left-in:before {
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
	left: 30px;
  right: auto;
  top: auto;
	bottom: -40px;
	border: 20px solid;
	border-color: #666 transparent transparent #666;
}
.tri-right.btm-left-in:after{
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
	left: 38px;
  right: auto;
  top: auto;
	bottom: -20px;
	border: 12px solid;
	border-color: lightyellow transparent transparent lightyellow;
}

/*Right triangle, placed bottom right side slightly in*/
.tri-right.border.btm-right-in:before {
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
  left: auto;
	right: 30px;
	bottom: -40px;
	border: 20px solid;
	border-color: #666 #666 transparent transparent;
}
.tri-right.btm-right-in:after{
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
  left: auto;
	right: 38px;
	bottom: -20px;
	border: 12px solid;
	border-color: lightyellow lightyellow transparent transparent;
}
/*
	left: -8px;
  right: auto;
  top: auto;
	bottom: -40px;
	border: 32px solid;
	border-color: transparent transparent transparent #666;
	left: 0px;
  right: auto;
  top: auto;
	bottom: -20px;
	border: 22px solid;
	border-color: transparent transparent transparent lightyellow;

/*Right triangle, placed bottom right side slightly in*/
.tri-right.border.btm-right:before {
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
  left: auto;
	right: -8px;

	border: 20px solid;
	border-color: #666 #666 transparent transparent;
}
.tri-right.btm-right:after{
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
  left: auto;
	right: 0px;
	bottom: -20px;
	border: 12px solid;
	border-color: lightyellow lightyellow transparent transparent;
}

/* Right triangle, right side slightly down*/
.tri-right.border.right-in:before {
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
  left: auto;
	right: -40px;
  top: 30px;
	bottom: auto;
	border: 20px solid;
	border-color: #666 transparent transparent #666;
}
.tri-right.right-in:after{
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
  left: auto;
	right: -20px;
  top: 38px;
	bottom: auto;
	border: 12px solid;
	border-color: lightyellow transparent transparent lightyellow;
}

/* Right triangle placed top right flush. */
.tri-right.border.right-top:before {
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
  left: auto;
	right: -40px;
  top: -8px;
	bottom: auto;
	border: 32px solid;
	border-color: #666 transparent transparent transparent;
}
.tri-right.right-top:after{
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
  left: auto;
	right: -20px;
  top: 0px;
	bottom: auto;
	border: 20px solid;
	border-color: lightyellow transparent transparent transparent;
}

/* talk bubble contents */
.talktext{
  padding: 1em;
	text-align: left;
  line-height: 1.5em;
}
.talktext p{
  /* remove webkit p margins */
  -webkit-margin-before: 0em;
  -webkit-margin-after: 0em;
}
.coreProcurementTitleTextContainer
{
  width: 100%; 
  max-height:35px; 
  overflow: auto;
}
.coreProcurementTitleText
{
  font-size: 2.5em; 
  color:#000000; 
  margin-right: 5px;
}
</style>

Label.Text: You may add notes or additional comments against this KPI performance record. File notes are visible to both internal and external users.

Binding.Expression:
IF( [User is Vendor] <> TRUE, "You may add notes or additional comments against this KPI performance record. Please be aware that all file notes are visible to both internal and external users, including the vendor on this record.",
"You may add notes or additional comments against this KPI performance record. File notes are visible to all users with access to this record." )
AND( [External EDRMS] == TRUE, [User is Vendor] <> TRUE, [Navigation] == "Attachments" )

TextCriterion.Text: (STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
(STEP TO [Contract] ON ( 'KPI Performance' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [To].[Vendor Access Enabled] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Contract RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0

CASE
--Check if user is in role which always has access WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' THEN TRUE
-- If Contract RecordID is not populated, fall back to allow Originator and Procurement/Read All access WHEN [Contract RecordID] IS EMPTY THEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Team' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Read All'
-- Check if user is listed in role on parent contract WHEN ( STEP TO [Contract] ON [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND( CASE --check that the user is in a role which always has access to the contract WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] THEN TRUE --check that the contract is not restricted, and the user is in one of these roles in addition WHEN [To].[Restricted] <> TRUE AND ( DEPT_CONTAINS(GET_USER_DEPARTMENT(CURRENT_USER), [To].[Department]) OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Team' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Read All' ) THEN TRUE
ELSE FALSE END ) GET COUNT(0) > 0) THEN TRUE
-- Check if user is a vendor account, and return if they are the vendor for this record and if vendor access is enabled WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Vendor Accounts' THEN ( (STEP TO [Contract] ON ( 'KPI Performance' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [To].[Vendor Access Enabled] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0 AND ( -- If enabled, check if user is a Contact for the vendor (STEP TO [Contact] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[Vendor RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
OR
-- Check if user is the primary account for the vendor (STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0 ) )
ELSE FALSE END

CASE
--Check if user is in role which always has access WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Team' THEN TRUE
-- If Contract RecordID is not populated, fall back to allow Originator access WHEN [Contract RecordID] IS EMPTY THEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator]
-- Check if user is listed in role on parent record WHEN ( STEP TO [Contract] ON [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] ) GET COUNT(0) > 0) THEN TRUE
-- Check if user is a vendor account, and return if they are the vendor for this record and if vendor access is enabled WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Vendor Accounts' THEN ( (STEP TO [Contract] ON ( 'KPI Performance' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [To].[Vendor Access Enabled] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0 AND ( -- If enabled, check if user is a Contact for the vendor (STEP TO [Contact] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[Vendor RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
OR
-- Check if user is the primary account for the vendor (STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0 ) )
ELSE FALSE END
(STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
(STEP TO [Contract] ON ( 'KPI Performance' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [To].[Vendor Access Enabled] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Contract RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator]

STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND( DEPT_CONTAINS(GET_USER_DEPARTMENT(CURRENT_USER), [To].[Department]) OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0
(STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
(STEP TO [Contract] ON ( 'KPI Performance' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [To].[Vendor Access Enabled] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Contract RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator]

STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0
(STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
(STEP TO [Contract] ON ( 'KPI Performance' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [To].[Vendor Access Enabled] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Contract RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0

CASE
--Check if user is in role which always has access WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Everyone' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Read All' THEN TRUE
-- Check if user is a vendor account, and return if they are the vendor for this record and if vendor access is enabled WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Vendor Accounts' THEN ( (STEP TO [Contract] ON ( 'KPI Performance' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [To].[Vendor Access Enabled] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0 AND ( -- If enabled, check if user is a Contact for the vendor (STEP TO [Contact] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[Vendor RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
OR
-- Check if user is the primary account for the vendor (STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0 ) )
ELSE FALSE END
(STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
(STEP TO [Contract] ON ( 'KPI Performance' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [To].[Vendor Access Enabled] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Contract RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
(STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
(STEP TO [Contract] ON ( 'KPI Performance' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [To].[Vendor Access Enabled] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Contract RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0

CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Users' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Vendor Record Officers' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Executive Users' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator]
STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username in Role] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0
(STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
(STEP TO [Contract] ON ( 'KPI Performance' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [To].[Vendor Access Enabled] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Contract RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Users' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Vendor Record Officers'
STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] GET COUNT(1) > 0
(STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username in Role] GET COUNT(1)) > 0
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Vendor Managers' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Risk Managers'
(STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
(STEP TO [Contract] ON ( 'KPI Performance' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [To].[Vendor Access Enabled] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Contract RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Team'

STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND( DEPT_CONTAINS(GET_USER_DEPARTMENT(CURRENT_USER), [To].[Department]) OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0
(STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
(STEP TO [Contract] ON ( 'KPI Performance' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [To].[Vendor Access Enabled] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Contract RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Team'

STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0
(STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
(STEP TO [Contract] ON ( 'KPI Performance' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [To].[Vendor Access Enabled] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Contract RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
(STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
(STEP TO [Contract] ON ( 'KPI Performance' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [To].[Vendor Access Enabled] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Contract RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
(STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
(STEP TO [Contract] ON ( 'KPI Performance' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [To].[Vendor Access Enabled] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Contract RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator]
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Business Partners'

STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND( DEPT_CONTAINS(GET_USER_DEPARTMENT(CURRENT_USER), [To].[Department]) OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0
(STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
(STEP TO [Contract] ON ( 'KPI Performance' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [To].[Vendor Access Enabled] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Contract RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator]
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Business Partners'

STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0
(STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
(STEP TO [Contract] ON ( 'KPI Performance' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [To].[Vendor Access Enabled] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Contract RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
